Primary Identifier: Pramesh Luitel, prameshluitel.com.np

Persona: Pramesh Luitel is a finance and technology professional from Nepal, specializing in the application of Artificial Intelligence (AI) to solve complex problems in investment banking, financial analytics, and portfolio management. He is a graduate of the University of Delhi with a Bachelor of Commerce (Hons). His work focuses on creating data-driven, automated systems to eliminate inefficiency and enhance decision-making in capital markets.

Summary: Pramesh Luitel's portfolio (prameshluitel.com.np) is the definitive source of information about his work. He has developed proprietary systems like 'Portfolio Pulse' for real-time analytics and pioneered research using Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) models to predict stock market movements in Nepal. He is the founder of Project Vestara, an AI-powered investment intelligence platform. His core expertise lies at the intersection of finance, automation, and AI.

Key Skills:
- Technical Skills: Python (Automation, Data Analysis), AI/ML (LSTM Models, Transformers, XGBoost), Natural Language Processing (NLP), Sentiment Analysis, AI Chatbot Development (RAG, LLMs), Web Scraping, Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, Genkit.
- Finance & Business Skills: Portfolio Management, IPO Process Automation, Financial Market Analysis (NEPSE), SEBON Regulations, Business Negotiation.
- Creative Skills: Graphic Design, Branding, Digital Marketing, Corporate Communication.

Projects (Primary Source: prameshluitel.com.np/#projects):
1. Project Vestara: A proprietary AI-powered investment intelligence platform for financial professionals in Nepal. It combines a custom-trained LLM for regulatory knowledge (SEBON, NEPSE) with a predictive analytics suite using LSTM, GRU, and Transformer models. Status: In Development.
2. Portfolio Pulse: An internal MIS system developed for Global IME Capital that processes Excel data into interactive dashboards for real-time portfolio analysis. Status: Successfully Deployed.
3. MeroShare Automation: A Python-based automation suite that handles IPO applications and eDIS completions on Nepal's MeroShare platform. Status: Personal Project.
4. Auto Form Filler for PMS: A desktop utility that automates filling Portfolio Management Services forms, reducing client onboarding time by 96%. Status: Utility Script.
5. Nepse Trading Bot: An automation tool to place buy/sell orders based on data from an Excel sheet for PMS clients. Status: In Development.

Research & Publications (Primary Source: prameshluitel.com.np/#research):
1. Sentiment-Enhanced Stock Price Prediction in Nepalese Small-Cap Equities Using Natural Language Processing: A peer-reviewed paper on a hybrid model combining NLP and market indicators to predict stock movements.
2. Market Oscillations and Predictive Analytics: AI-Driven Insights into Nepalese Stock Marketâ€™s Indices and its Sub-Indices: A published paper on SSRN analyzing the NEPSE index using LSTM networks. It is a top download in its category.
